column4: how do i envoke an fsck of a partition for next reboot? its been mounteded 146 times w/o being scanned
touch forcefsck  at the root of the partition
this channel is dedicated to support only, #ubuntu-offtopic for other stuff
can you get to a tty?
Nope. This is from the Install CD, though
you might want to try to install with the alternate cd then sort out the details later
verified the integrity of the cd?
don't know then.  Scrounge bugs.ubuntu.com and the wiki for hints
